faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about our services.
faq.a1: Landing pages are delivered in 5-7 business days. Complete websites take 10-15 business days, depending on project complexity.
faq.a2: Landing pages start at €200 and complete websites from €400. The final price depends on the features and pages needed. We provide custom quotes.
faq.q3: Do I need a domain and hosting?
faq.a3: We can help register the domain and set up hosting. We recommend options starting at €50/year that include everything.
faq.a4: We include 2 rounds of revisions in all packages. Additional changes are quoted separately if needed.
faq.a5: Yes, all projects include basic on-page SEO. Growth and Premium packages include complete local SEO with Google My Business.
faq.q6: Do you offer maintenance after delivery?
faq.a6: Yes, we offer optional maintenance plans. The Premium package includes 3 months of support and adjustments.
faq.q7: How does the delivery process work?
faq.a7: After quote approval, we do the initial diagnosis, present the design proposal, implement with your revisions, and publish the final project with all tracking configured.
